ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Clothing or armor for a Mage
ygData.msgSnippet: Forget the AC as mage, it wont do you any good. Get more +int and +mana on your items, it will help you way more in the long run. And get your focus items. ...
ygData.messageBody:
Forget the AC as mage, it wont do you any good. Get more +int and +mana on
your items, it will help you way more in the long run. And get your focus
items.


-----Original Message-----
From: Steven R. Hulse [mailto:steve@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 18, 2002 9:10 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Clothing or armor for a Mage


Hi all,

Well I've been playing my Gnome Mage quite a bit and I was
wondering if anyone knew what type of clothing or armor I can get for
him to help his AC level? For example, would he be able to wear soft
wicker leggings from Ak'anon or will it tell me that I can't equip this
item?


Thanks!
Shizney: lvl6 Gnome Mage

Gnomes RULE!



Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
